adsdrill.catalyst.head: Catalyst
adsdrill.jei.info.anvil_tuning:
The Netherite Node Locator can be tuned in an Anvil.

- Combine with an Ore or Fluid Container to set a filter.
- Combine an already tuned locator with the other type for combined filtering.
- Combine with Flint to clear all filters.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.1: The final properties of an Artificial Node are determined by the combination of 'Unfinished Node Data', a 'Stabilizer Core', and 'Catalysts'.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.6: §lSummary:§r Use §eData§r to design your ore blend, a §eCore§r to set the overall power level, and §eCatalysts§r to target specific Quirks.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.compositi: - §bComposition:§r The final ore ratios are a weighted average based on the composition and yield of all input 'Node Data'.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.fluid: - The fluid with the highest total capacity among all input 'Node Data' will be chosen as the final fluid.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.quirk_cat: - §bCatalyst:§r Greatly increases the §dprobability§r of a specific, related Quirk appearing.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.quirk_cor: - §bStabilizer Core:§r Determines the §dnumber§r and §dtier§r (Common/Rare/Epic) of Quirks that can be generated.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.stats: - These are determined §drandomly§r within a range set by the 'Stabilizer Core' tier and are §cnot§r affected by the input data. Higher tier cores result in better average stats.
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.sub.yield: - §bYield:§r The final max yield is the sum of all input 'Node Data' yields, multiplied by a factor from the 'Stabilizer Core' (Brass: 0.8x, Steel: 1.0x, Netherite: 1.25x).
adsdrill.jei.info.crafting.title: §lAdvanced Node Crafting
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.1: Drills generate heat during operation, which directly impacts their efficiency. You can monitor the current heat, efficiency, and overheat status in real-time with §6Goggles§r.
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.2: §7Heat Generation & Cooling:§r Heat increases based on the Drill Head type and rotational speed. When idle, the drill cools down. 'Heatsink' or 'Coolant' modules can accelerate cooling.
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.range.boost: - §6Optimal Boost (%s%% - %s%%):§r Efficiency gradually increases up to a maximum of §e%sx§r.
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.range.overheated: - §4Overheated (100%%):§r The drill shuts down immediately. It will not restart until the heat drops below §9%s%%§r.
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.range.overload: - §cOverloading (%s%% - 99.9%%):§r Efficiency begins to drop off sharply.
adsdrill.jei.info.heat.title: §lHeat Management System
adsdrill.jei.info.introduction.1: AdsDrill adds a modular, multi-block drilling system based on the Create mod. This guide will help you build, optimize, and unleash the full potential of your drills.
adsdrill.jei.info.introduction.2: The core component is the 'Drill Core'. Attach a 'Drill Head' to begin mining, and connect various 'Modules' to its sides to enhance performance or add new functionality.
adsdrill.jei.info.introduction.3: §6§lEngineer's Goggles§r are an essential tool for viewing real-time information about your drill's status, ore node statistics, and more.
adsdrill.jei.info.introduction.4: §8Most detailed settings can be adjusted in the `adsdrill-server.toml` config file. The values in this guide are based on the default configuration.
adsdrill.jei.info.introduction.title: §lIntroduction to Advanced Drilling
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.1: Mining occurs whenever the drill's 'Mining Power' overcomes a node's 'Mining Resistance'. This is called a 'Mining Cycle'.
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.step1_detail: - For rotary heads, this is the drill's final speed (RPM) divided by a config value (`rotarySpeedDivisor`: %s). Laser Heads have a fixed power (`laserMiningAmount`: %d).
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.step2_detail: - The node's §bHardness§r acts as a divisor. Effective Mining Power is `Base Mining Power / Hardness`. A node with 2.0 Hardness will halve your mining power.
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.step3_detail: - Each tick (1/20s), 'Effective Mining Power' is added to 'Mining Progress'. Every node has a fixed 'Mining Resistance' of 1000.
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.step4_detail: - When 'Mining Progress' exceeds 'Mining Resistance' (1000), one §aMining Cycle§r is completed. The node's 'Yield' is consumed by 1, and an ore item is dropped. Any leftover progress carries over to the next cycle.
adsdrill.jei.info.mining.title: §lMining Logic Explained
adsdrill.jei.info.modules.1: Modules alter the drill's performance or add automation. Mined items pass through a chain of 'Processing Modules' in a specific order.
adsdrill.jei.info.modules.2: §7Processing Order:§r Items are processed by modules with a lower priority number first. You can view the established processing order by looking at the core with §6Goggles§r.
adsdrill.jei.info.modules.3: §7Setting Priority:§r Use a Wrench on a processing module (Furnace, Crusher, Filter, etc.) to cycle its priority from 1 to 10.
adsdrill.jei.info.modules.4: §7System & Compactor Modules:§r Modules like the Coolant and Kinetic Dynamo affect the core directly each tick, while the Compactor acts after all other processing, so they do not have a set priority.
adsdrill.jei.info.modules.title: §lModule System & Priority
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.1: Natural Ore Nodes are massive, indestructible ore deposits found deep underground. They can only be harvested by the AdsDrill system.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.2: §7Exploration:§r As these nodes do not generate exposed to air, a 'Node Locator' is required to find them.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.3: §7Composition:§r A node's ore content is influenced by the biome and dimension it spawns in. These rules can be configured in `dimension_profiles`.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.4: §7Information:§r Wearing §6Engineer's Goggles§r and looking at a node will display its detailed statistics, including yield, hardness, richness, regeneration, and fluid content.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.5: §7Utilization:§r You can either mine resources directly or use a 'Laser Drill Head' in Decomposition mode to break the node down into 'Unfinished Node Data' for crafting artificial nodes.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.6: §7Removal:§r The 'Ore Node Neutralizer' can be used to permanently destroy a natural ore node. This item will not work on artificial nodes.
adsdrill.jei.info.natural_nodes.title: §lNatural Ore Nodes
adsdrill.jei.info.quirks.1: Artificial Nodes, crafted in a Node Frame, can possess unique 'Quirks' that grant special effects, altering how they are mined or how they interact with the environment.
adsdrill.jei.info.quirks.title: §lArtificial Nodes & Quirks
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.1: Ore Nodes have three base stats that determine their performance. You can view these base stats at any time using Engineer's Goggles.
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.3: Quirks can modify these base stats. The goggle tooltip will show the final 'effective' values in the modifier section. The formulas are as follows:
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.4: When sneaking, the goggle tooltip shows the base `(H, R, G)` values for quick reference, without these formulas applied.
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.formula_hardness: - §eEffective Hardness§r = `Base H * Quirk Multipliers` (e.g., Aquifer reduces this value).
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.hardness: - §bHardness (H):§r Acts as a divisor for mining power. Higher hardness means slower mining.
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.regeneration: - §bRegeneration (G):§r The base rate at which the node's Yield replenishes per second (Yield/s).
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.richness: - §bRichness (R):§r Increases the chance of getting extra drops per mining cycle and significantly boosts regeneration speed.
adsdrill.jei.info.stats.title: §lUnderstanding Node Stats
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.1: A valid drill structure consists of one 'Drill Core', one 'Drill Head', and multiple 'Modules'. Wearing §6Goggles§r while looking at the core allows you to instantly check the structure's validity and its current stats.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.2: §71. Power Input:§r Rotational force from Create must be supplied to the 'back' of the Drill Core (the face with normal shaft).
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.3: §72. Head Attachment:§r The Drill Head must be placed on the 'front' of the Drill Core (with bigger shaft). The head's orientation must also face away from the core.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.4: §73. Module Connection:§r Modules can be attached to the 'sides' of the Drill Core (the four faces that are not the front or back), either directly or by chaining them off of other modules.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.5: §7Common reasons for an invalid structure include:§r
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.error.duplic: - §cDuplicate Processing Module:§r Only one of each type of processing module (e.g., Furnace, Crusher) can be installed.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.error.limit: - §cModule Limit Exceeded:§r The core's tier determines the maximum number of modules. (Config: brassDrillMaxModules, etc.)
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.error.loop: - §cLoop Detected:§r Modules are connected in a way that forms a closed loop.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.error.multip: - §cMultiple Cores:§r A single drill assembly can only have one Drill Core.
adsdrill.jei.info.structure.title: §lDrill Assembly Basics
adsdrill.jei.requires_drill: Requires a Rotary Drill Head above, powered by a Drill Core.
adsdrill.jei.tooltip.catalyst: Optional. Catalysts increase the chance of specific Quirks appearing.
adsdrill.jei.tooltip.node_data: Insert 1 to 9 Unfinished Node Data items. More data increases the final node's yield.
adsdrill.jei.tooltip.stabilizer_core: A Stabilizer Core is required. The tier of the core determines the potential stats and Quirks of the final node.
adsdrill.laser_designator.not_linked: Link to a Laser Head first! (Sneak + Right-Click)
adsdrill.laser_designator.tooltip: Links to a Laser Head to designate targets.
adsdrill.upgrade_fail.conflict: Cannot apply this upgrade while another is active.
adsdrill.upgrade_fail.max_level: Fortune is already at maximum level.
adsdrill.upgrade_success.fortune: Fortune on Drill Head upgraded to level %s.
adsdrill.upgrade_success.silktouch: Silk Touch applied to Drill Head.
advancements.adsdrill.artificial_node.co: With the power of a Node Frame and a Drill, create something from almost nothing. Obtain your first Artificial Ore Node!
advancements.adsdrill.artificial_node.de: Use a Laser Drill in Decomposition mode to break down a natural ore node into raw data.
advancements.adsdrill.artificial_node.fr: Craft the Node Frame, the foundation for creating artificial ore nodes.
advancements.adsdrill.artificial_node.st: Craft a Stabilizer Core, which determines the properties of an artificial node.
advancements.adsdrill.heads.applied_ench: Apply a Fortune or Silk Touch upgrade directly to a Rotary Drill Head.
advancements.adsdrill.heads.basic_rotary: Craft the most basic Rotary Drill Head to complete your drill assembly.
advancements.adsdrill.heads.diamond_rota: Strengthen your Rotary Drill Head with diamonds.
advancements.adsdrill.heads.hydraulic_dr: Craft a Hydraulic Drill Head to selectively mine specific resources using the power of water.
Craft the pinnacle of mining technology, the Laser Drill Head.
advancements.adsdrill.heads.netherite_ro: Make your End tier Rotary Drill Head
advancements.adsdrill.heads.unstable_min: Craft an Explosive Drill Head. It seems to react... interestingly to overheating.
advancements.adsdrill.hidden.catalyst_co: You have collected every known catalyst capable of influencing the very nature of artificial nodes. A true alchemist!
advancements.adsdrill.hidden.fine_tuning: Tune a Netherite Node Locator in an Anvil to seek out a specific resource.
advancements.adsdrill.main.netherite_cor: Perform the final upgrade on your Drill Core with Netherite to unleash its maximum potential.
advancements.adsdrill.main.steel_core.de: Upgrade the Brass Drill Core to Steel to attach more modules and increase its efficiency.
advancements.adsdrill.modules.frame.desc: Craft a Frame Module, the foundation for all other modules.
advancements.adsdrill.modules.power_mana: Construct an energy module to generate, store, or receive FE for advanced drill heads.
advancements.adsdrill.modules.processing: Add a processing module, like a Furnace or Crusher, to handle everything from mining to smelting.
advancements.adsdrill.modules.redstone_c: Add a Redstone Brake Module to your assembly for remote control capabilities.
advancements.adsdrill.modules.specialize: Upgrade a Frame Module into a Speed or Buffer Module to enhance your drill's performance.
advancements.adsdrill.root.description: Craft a Drill Core, the heart of a modular mining drill.
advancements.adsdrill.root.title: Advanced Drilling
advancements.adsdrill.tools.advanced_loc: Upgrade your Node Locator for a wider range and more precise targeting capabilities.
advancements.adsdrill.tools.laser_design: Craft a Laser Designator to manually assign targets to your Laser Drill Head.
advancements.adsdrill.tools.locator.desc: Craft a Node Locator to search for hidden ore nodes beneath the surface.
goggle.adsdrill.drill_core.reason.insuff: Warning: Insufficient energy for Laser Head operation.
goggle.adsdrill.drill_core.reason.multip: Error: Multiple cores in one assembly.
goggle.adsdrill.drill_core.reason.no_ene: Warning: No energy source detected for Laser Head.
message.adsdrill.locator.found.brass: Node detected nearby! (Right-click node to find next)
message.adsdrill.locator.found.netherite: Node locked at: %s, %s, %s (Right-click node to find next)
message.adsdrill.locator.found.steel: Node detected! Approx. %s blocks away. (Right-click node to find next)
message.adsdrill.locator.no_target_store: No target stored in this locator.
message.adsdrill.restorative.full: The node's yield is already full!
quirk.adsdrill.aquifer.description: §7Reduces node Hardness while the internal fluid level is between %s and %s of its capacity.
quirk.adsdrill.aura_of_vitality.descript: §7Slightly increases the regeneration rate of nearby ore nodes.
quirk.adsdrill.bone_chill.description: §7Has a chance to spawn a Skeleton nearby when mined.
quirk.adsdrill.bottled_knowledge.descrip: §7Has a chance to drop a Bottle o' Enchanting alongside ores.
quirk.adsdrill.buried_treasure.descripti: §7Has a %s chance to yield a random item from ancient structures.
quirk.adsdrill.chaotic_output.descriptio: §7Has a %s chance to yield a random ore from this node's composition, ignoring normal ratios.
quirk.adsdrill.gemstone_facets.descripti: §7Doubles the effectiveness of the Fortune enchantment on this node.
quirk.adsdrill.overload_discharge.descri: §7When the drill core overheats, may cause a lightning strike on it.
quirk.adsdrill.petrified_heart.descripti: §7This node's Regeneration is boosted based on its Hardness.
quirk.adsdrill.polarity_negative.descrip: §7Increases mining yield if a Positive Polarity node is nearby.
quirk.adsdrill.polarity_positive.descrip: §7Increases mining yield if a Negative Polarity node is nearby.
quirk.adsdrill.purifying_resonance.descr: §7Increases the drop chance of the most dominant ore.
quirk.adsdrill.signal_amplification.desc: §7Increases mining yield by 10% while receiving a redstone signal.
quirk.adsdrill.static_charge.description: §7Has a chance to double mining output during rain or snow.
quirk.adsdrill.steady_hands.description: §7Guarantees at least two item drop per cycle.
quirk.adsdrill.trace_minerals.descriptio: §7Has a small chance to yield Iron Nuggets as a byproduct.
quirk.adsdrill.volatile_fissures.descrip: §7Causes a small explosion for every 10 yield consumed, damaging nearby entities and briefly becoming Cracked.
quirk.adsdrill.wild_magic.description: §7Sometimes creates random, harmless visual and sound effects.
quirk.adsdrill.withering_echo.descriptio: §7When the drill core overheats, spawns a Wither Skeleton.
tooltip.adsdrill.artificial_node.descrip: An artificial Ore Node crafted in the Node Frame. Can be retrieved with a Wrench.
tooltip.adsdrill.blast_furnace_module.de: Smelts mined items faster than a Furnace Module. Consumes more heat.
tooltip.adsdrill.compactor_module.descri: Automatically compacts items from the internal buffer using 3x3 recipes.
tooltip.adsdrill.coolant_module.after_co: When receiving a Redstone signal, it activates after an overheat.
tooltip.adsdrill.coolant_module.descript: Rapidly cools the drill by consuming water from the internal buffer.
tooltip.adsdrill.crusher_module.descript: Automatically crushes mined items into dusts.
tooltip.adsdrill.drill_core.description: The heart of a modular drill assembly. Right-click with an Upgrade Kit to enhance.
tooltip.adsdrill.efficiency_module.descr: Improves heat efficiency, mitigating overheating and optimizing performance.
tooltip.adsdrill.energy_buffer_module.de: Adds an internal FE energy storage buffer to the drill.
tooltip.adsdrill.energy_input_module.des: Receives FE from external sources and supplies it to the drill.
tooltip.adsdrill.explosive_drill_head.de: Consumes an item on overheat to fracture an Ore Node, enabling special combination recipes.
tooltip.adsdrill.filter_module.descripti: Controls the item processing flow by filtering items.
tooltip.adsdrill.fluid_buffer_module.des: Adds an internal fluid storage buffer of 16,000 mB to the drill.
tooltip.adsdrill.frame_module.descriptio: The basic chassis for all functional modules.
tooltip.adsdrill.furnace_module.descript: Automatically smelts mined items. Consumes the core's heat.
tooltip.adsdrill.heatsink_module.descrip: Increases the drill's base heat dissipation rate.
tooltip.adsdrill.hydraulic_drill_head.de: Consumes water to selectively mine raw materials (ores, gems, etc.).
tooltip.adsdrill.item_buffer_module.desc: Adds an internal item storage buffer of 16 slots to the drill.
tooltip.adsdrill.kinetic_dynamo_module.d: Generates FE directly from the drill's rotational force.
tooltip.adsdrill.laser_designator.mode_c: Right-click a Laser Head to cycle its mode.
tooltip.adsdrill.laser_drill_head.descri: An advanced, FE-powered drill head. Controlled with the Laser Designator.
Right-click on a module to revert it to a Frame Module.
tooltip.adsdrill.node_locator.tuning_inf: Tune with an Ore or Fluid Container in an Anvil. Can be combined for compound filtering. Clear with Flint.
tooltip.adsdrill.node_locator.usage.next: Right-click a located node to find the next one.
tooltip.adsdrill.node_restorative.descri: Right-click on an Ore Node to restore a portion of its yield.
tooltip.adsdrill.ore_node_neutralizer.de: Use on a natural Ore Node to permanently remove it.
tooltip.adsdrill.pump_head.description: Directly extracts fluids from the internal tank of an Ore Node.
tooltip.adsdrill.pump_head.stats: Base Pumping Rate: %d mB/t at 64 RPM
tooltip.adsdrill.redstone_brake_module.d: Halts all drill operations when receiving a redstone signal.
tooltip.adsdrill.reinforcement_module.de: Reduces Stress Impact, allowing more modules to be attached.
tooltip.adsdrill.resonator_module.descri: Guides the Laser Drill to mine only a specific resource.
tooltip.adsdrill.rotary_drill_head.descr: A standard drill head for mining Ore Nodes. Can be enchanted by right-clicking with specific items.
tooltip.adsdrill.speed_module.descriptio: Increases drill speed, but also raises Stress Impact and Heat Generation.
tooltip.adsdrill.stabilizer_core.descrip: Used in a Node Frame to determine the properties of an artificial node.
tooltip.adsdrill.washer_module.descripti: Automatically washes mined items, consuming water from the drill's buffer.
